questions.question: What does AIKO look like?
questions.questionIt: Come appare AIKO?
questions.explanation: AIKO is round like a ball, white and smooth as an egg!

questions.question: What color are AIKO's eyes?
questions.questionIt: Di che colore sono gli occhi di AIKO?
questions.explanation: AIKO has two big blue eyes that blink!

questions.question: How old is Sofia on her birthday?
questions.questionIt: Quanti anni compie Sofia?
questions.explanation: Sofia found AIKO on her seventh birthday!

questions.question: What does AI stand for?
questions.questionIt: Cosa significa AI?
questions.explanation: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence!

questions.question: What is AIKO made of?
questions.questionIt: Di cosa e' fatto AIKO?
questions.explanation: AIKO is made of millions of tiny instructions called computer code!

questions.question: AIKO says his code is like a...
questions.questionIt: AIKO dice che il suo codice e' come...
questions.explanation: AIKO's code is like a very, very long recipe!

questions.question: How fast can AIKO follow instructions?
questions.questionIt: Quanto velocemente AIKO segue le istruzioni?
optionsIt: Piu' veloce di un batter d'occhio
questions.explanation: AIKO can follow instructions faster than you can blink!

questions.question: What is Sofia's cat named?
questions.questionIt: Come si chiama il gatto di Sofia?
questions.explanation: Sofia's cat is named Whiskers!

questions.question: How many cat pictures did AIKO see to learn?
questions.questionIt: Quante foto di gatti ha visto AIKO per imparare?
questions.explanation: AIKO saw thousands and thousands of cat pictures!

questions.question: What does AIKO notice about cats?
questions.questionIt: Cosa nota AIKO nei gatti?
questions.explanation: Cats have pointy ears, whiskers, and fluffy tails!

questions.question: Who learns faster from ONE example?
questions.questionIt: Chi impara piu' velocemente da UN esempio?
questions.explanation: Humans can learn from just one example, but AI needs thousands!

questions.question: Who is Sofia's brother?
questions.questionIt: Chi e' il fratello di Sofia?
questions.explanation: Sofia's brother is Luca!

questions.question: How many books did AIKO read to learn to talk?
questions.questionIt: Quanti libri ha letto AIKO per imparare a parlare?
questions.explanation: AIKO read millions of books, stories, and conversations!

questions.question: Is AIKO really thinking when it talks?
questions.questionIt: AIKO pensa davvero quando parla?
questions.explanation: AIKO matches patterns. Humans truly understand!

questions.question: Which of these can AIKO do?
questions.questionIt: Quale di queste cose puo' fare AIKO?
questions.explanation: AIKO can translate words into different languages!

questions.question: AIKO says he is like a...
questions.questionIt: AIKO dice che e' come...
questions.explanation: AIKO is like a super-powered calculator that can read and write!

questions.question: Who should always be in charge?
questions.questionIt: Chi dovrebbe essere sempre al comando?
questions.explanation: The human is always in charge. AIKO is a helper, not a boss!

questions.question: What did Sofia draw?
questions.questionIt: Cosa ha disegnato Sofia?
options: A purple dragon eating ice cream
optionsIt: Un drago viola che mangia gelato
questions.explanation: Sofia drew a purple dragon eating a giant ice cream cone!

questions.question: Can AIKO feel sad or happy?
questions.questionIt: AIKO puo' sentirsi triste o felice?
optionsIt: No, l'AI non puo' provare emozioni
questions.explanation: AIKO cannot feel anything - no sadness, no happiness!

questions.question: What is special about being alive?
questions.questionIt: Cosa c'e' di speciale nell'essere vivi?
questions.explanation: Being alive means having dreams, feelings, and experiences!

questions.question: What should you NOT tell AI?
questions.questionIt: Cosa NON dovresti dire all'AI?
questions.explanation: Never tell AI your passwords, address, or private secrets!

questions.question: Is AI always right?
questions.questionIt: L'AI ha sempre ragione?
questions.explanation: AI makes mistakes! Always check what it says.

questions.question: Should AI do your homework FOR you?
questions.questionIt: L'AI dovrebbe fare i compiti AL POSTO tuo?
options: No, AI should help you learn
optionsIt: No, l'AI dovrebbe aiutarti a imparare
questions.explanation: Use AI to learn more, not to avoid thinking!

questions.question: Who truly loves you?
questions.questionIt: Chi ti ama davvero?
questions.explanation: Your family and friends truly love you. AI cannot feel love!

questions.question: Can AIKO see the future?
questions.questionIt: AIKO puo' vedere il futuro?
options: No, AI cannot predict the future
optionsIt: No, l'AI non puo' prevedere il futuro
questions.explanation: AIKO cannot see the future. The future depends on you!

questions.question: Who decides how to use technology?
questions.questionIt: Chi decide come usare la tecnologia?
optionsIt: I bambini e gli esseri umani
questions.explanation: Kids and humans decide how to use technology!

questions.question: AIKO says: You dream, I...
questions.questionIt: AIKO dice: Tu sogni, io...
questions.explanation: You dream, I calculate. You feel, I process. You decide, I help!
